revised_title: Direct Observation of Transverse Fresnel Aether Drag
tldr: The author conducted an experiment to directly observe the transverse Fresnel aether drag effect by projecting a beam of light through a rotating glass disk and measuring the consequent transverse displacement using a photoelectric alinement technique. The experiment confirmed the transverse aether drag phenomenon, which was previously inferred from Airy's null experiment in 1872.
